title: Swiggy launches new service Bolt to deliver food in 10-15 minutes
description: For now, a limited set of food items from select restaurants will be on offer. According to CEO Rohit Kapoor, the service is being rolled out in Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Mumbai, Chennai, Delhi, and Pune.
content: Public markets-bound Swiggy has rolled out a 10-minute food delivery service Bolt, the company said
cleaned_content: public markets bound swiggy has rolled out a <ONE_TEN> minute food delivery service bolt the company said
